message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. This is a great deal for something you'll get a lot of use out of.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $90? This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm still looking to keep my spending within $80 if possible. Could we perhaps meet halfway at $85?
